  • Uses of CapableActor in edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces

    Methods in edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces with parameters of type CapableActor
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean GroundInterface.canBreedHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns true if the CapableActor can breed on the ground, false otherwise.
    boolean GroundInterface.canLayEggHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns true if the CapableActor can lay an egg on the ground, false otherwise.

  • Uses of CapableActor in game

    Methods in game with parameters of type CapableActor
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean Food.canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
    Returns true if Food at location can be eaten by CapableActor, false otherwise.
    boolean FoodItem.canEat​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns true if the FoodItem is appropriate for the CapableActor's diet, false otherwise

  • Uses of CapableActor in game.attack

    Methods in game.attack with parameters of type CapableActor
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean Corpse.canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
    Returns true if the CapableActor attempting to eat it is carnivorous, returns false otherwise.

  • Uses of CapableActor in game.dinosaurs

    Subclasses of CapableActor in game.dinosaurs
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Allosaur
    An aggressive carnivorous dinosaur that can attack Stegosaur.
    class  Brachiosaur
    A herbivorous dinosaur that can eat fruits from trees, can destroy bushes and cannot be attacked by Allosaur.
    class  DinoActor
    Base class for Stegosaur, Brachiosaur and Allosaur for representing dinosaur Actors.
    class  Pterodactyl
    A small carnivorous DinoActor that can fly.
    class  Stegosaur
    A herbivorous dinosaur that can eat fruits on the ground and on bushes, and can be attacked by Allosaur.
    Methods in game.dinosaurs with parameters of type CapableActor
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean Egg.canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
    Returns true if the CapableActor is a carnivorous DinoActor that is of different species with the Egg, false otherwise.
    boolean Pterodactyl.canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
    Returns true if the CapableActor is aggressive and carnivorous and the Pterodactyl is within its reach (not on a tree), false otherwise.

  • Uses of CapableActor in game.environment

    Methods in game.environment with parameters of type CapableActor
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean Bush.canBreedHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns true if the CapableActor can breed on Bush, which is when the CapableActor is not arboreal (does not live on trees), returns false otherwise.
    boolean Dirt.canBreedHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns true if the CapableActor can breed on Dirt, which is when the CapableActor is not arboreal (does not live on trees), returns false otherwise.
    boolean Floor.canBreedHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns true if the CapableActor can breed on Floor, which is when the CapableActor is not arboreal (does not live on trees), returns false otherwise.
    boolean Lake.canBreedHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns false since no CapableActor should be able to breed in a Lake.
    boolean Tree.canBreedHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns true since all CapableActors can breed on this ground
    boolean Wall.canBreedHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns false since no CapableActor should be able to breed on top of it.
    boolean Bush.canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
    Returns true if the CapableActor can eat a fruit growing on the Bush, which is when the CapableActor is a short herbivore and the Bush has fruits growing on it, returns false otherwise.
    boolean Fish.canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
    Returns true if Fish can be eaten, which is if the CapableActor is a carnivore, returns false otherwise.
    boolean Fruit.canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)  
    boolean Lake.canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
    Returns true if the CapableActor can eat Food in the Lake, which is Fish, hence the CapableActor must be carnivorous, otherwise returns false.
    boolean Tree.canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
    Returns true if the CapableActor can eat fruits growing on the tree, which is when the CapableActor is a tall herbivore and the tree has fruits growing on it, returns false otherwise.
    boolean Bush.canLayEggHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns true if the CapableActor can lay an Egg on Bush, which is when the CapableActor is not arboreal (does not live on trees), returns false otherwise.
    boolean Dirt.canLayEggHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns true if the CapableActor can lay an Egg on Dirt, which is when the CapableActor is not arboreal (does not live on trees), returns false otherwise.
    boolean Floor.canLayEggHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns true if the CapableActor can lay an Egg on Floor, which is when the CapableActor is arboreal (does not live on trees), returns false otherwise.
    boolean Lake.canLayEggHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns false since no CapableActor should be able to lay an Egg in a Lake.
    boolean Tree.canLayEggHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns true since all CapableActors can lay an Egg on this ground
    boolean Wall.canLayEggHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns false since no CapableActor should be able to lay an Egg on top of it.

  • Uses of CapableActor in game.player

    Methods in game.player with parameters of type CapableActor
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean VendingMachine.canBreedHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns false to indication CapableActors cannot breed on this ground.
    boolean MealKitsItem.canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
    Returns true if the meal kit can be eaten by the CapableActor with the appropriate diet, false otherwise.
    boolean VendingMachine.canLayEggHere​(CapableActor capableActor)
    Returns false to indicate CapableActors cannot lay an Egg on this ground.
